plays.text: Goal scored by Adam Graves assisted by Todd Harvey and Owen Nolan
Penalty to Ronald Petrovicky 2 minutes for Tripping Evgeni Nabokov
Goal scored by Owen Nolan assisted by Gary Suter and Brad Stuart
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Interference Craig Conroy
Penalty to Dean McAmmond 2 minutes for Slashing Gary Suter
Penalty to Gary Suter 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Dean McAmmond
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Holding Marc Savard
Penalty to Vincent Damphousse 2 minutes for Crosschecking Marc Savard
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Dean McAmmond
Penalty to Craig Berube 2 minutes for Slashing Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Ronald Petrovicky 2 minutes for Roughing JEFF JILLSON
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Clipping Dean McAmmond
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Roughing Robyn Regehr
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Roughing Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Roughing Bryan Marchment
Penalty to Brad Stuart 2 minutes for Charging Rob Niedermayer served by Todd Harvey
Penalty to Brad Stuart 5 minutes for Fighting Rob Niedermayer
Penalty to Rob Niedermayer 5 minutes for Fighting Brad Stuart
2 minute Bench Penalty for Instigator
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Holding Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Jeff Cowan 2 minutes for Holding Scott Hannan
Goal scored by Niklas Sundstrom assisted by Scott Thornton and Mike Ricci
